analisis_canciones_pop.puente_clave: My thoughts are here with you. Holding hands with your heart to see you.
analisis_canciones_pop.estribillo_clave: Baa de ya, say do you remember. Baa de ya, dancing in September. Baa de ya, golden dreams were shining in the night.
analisis_canciones_pop.proposito_gancho: Nostalgia/Alegría: Invita a recordar un momento de amor y felicidad en el pasado.

analisis_canciones_pop.estrofa_1_clave: Imagine there's no heaven, it's easy if you try. No hell below us, above us only sky.
analisis_canciones_pop.puente_clave: You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one.
analisis_canciones_pop.estribillo_clave: I hope someday you'll join us, and the world will be as one.

analisis_canciones_pop.estrofa_1_clave: It's nine o'clock on a Saturday, the regular crowd shuffles in. There's an old man sitting next to me, making love to his tonic and gin.
analisis_canciones_pop.puente_clave: It's a pretty good crowd for a Saturday, and the manager gives me a smile. 'Cause he knows that it's me they've been coming to see, to forget about life for a while.

analisis_canciones_pop.estrofa_1_clave: Sometimes in our lives we all have pain, we all have sorrow. But if we are wise, we know that there's always tomorrow.
analisis_canciones_pop.puente_clave: Just call on me brother, when you need a hand. We all need somebody to lean on.
analisis_canciones_pop.estribillo_clave: Lean on me, when you're not strong, and I'll be your friend, I'll help you carry on. For it won't be long 'til I'm gonna need somebody to lean on.

analisis_canciones_pop.estribillo_clave: And I think it's gonna be a long, long time 'til touchdown brings me 'round again to find. I'm not the man they think I am at home. Oh no no no, I'm a rocket man.

analisis_canciones_pop.estrofa_1_clave: It's a little bit funny, this feeling inside. I'm not one of those who can easily hide. I don't have much money but boy if I did, I'd buy a big house where we both could live.
analisis_canciones_pop.puente_clave: I hope you don't mind, I hope you don't mind. That I put down in words.

analisis_canciones_pop.estrofa_1_clave: Look around, everywhere you turn is heartache. It's everywhere that you go. You'll get your share of pleasure and of pain.
analisis_canciones_pop.puente_clave: Beauty's where you find it, not just where you bump and grind it. Let your body go with the flow.

analisis_canciones_pop.estrofa_1_clave: Every night in my dreams I see you, I feel you. That is how I know you go on. Far across the distance and spaces between us.
analisis_canciones_pop.puente_clave: Love was once the one thing I held onto. We'll stay forever this way. You are safe in my heart.
analisis_canciones_pop.estribillo_clave: Near, far, wherever you are, I believe that the heart does go on. Once more you open the door, and you're here in my heart, and my heart will go on and on.

analisis_canciones_pop.estrofa_1_clave: If I should stay, I would only be in your way. So I'll go, but I know I'll think of you every step of the way.
analisis_canciones_pop.puente_clave: Bittersweet memories that is all I'm taking with me. So goodbye. Please don't cry.
analisis_canciones_pop.estribillo_clave: And I will always love you. I will always love you.
analisis_canciones_pop.proposito_gancho: Despedida Amable: Declaración de amor profundo y respetuoso, aceptando la necesidad de la separación.

analisis_canciones_pop.estrofa_1_clave: Would you know my name, if I saw you in heaven? Would it be the same, if I saw you in heaven? I must be strong and carry on.
analisis_canciones_pop.puente_clave: Beyond the door there's peace I'm sure. And I know there'll be no more tears in heaven.
analisis_canciones_pop.estribillo_clave: I must be strong and carry on, 'cause I know I don't belong here in heaven.
analisis_canciones_pop.proposito_gancho: Luto/Pérdida: Reflexión conmovedora sobre la muerte de un ser querido y el dolor.

analisis_canciones_pop.estrofa_1_clave: There is so much a man can tell you, so much he can say. You'll lose your mind and play games. / Did you know that when it snows, my eyes become large and the light that you shine can be seen?
analisis_canciones_pop.puente_clave: Baby, I compare you to a kiss from a rose on the grey. Ooh, the more I get of you, the stranger it feels, yeah.
analisis_canciones_pop.estribillo_clave: You're all I ever wanted. You're all I ever needed. And now that your soul knows what it is to fly and be free...
analisis_canciones_pop.proposito_gancho: Amor Abstracto: Metáfora poética para describir la belleza y la complejidad del amor.

analisis_canciones_pop.estrofa_1_clave: A scrub is hanging out the passenger side of his best friend's ride, trying to holler at me. I'm looking like class and he's looking like trash.
analisis_canciones_pop.puente_clave: If you don't have a car and you're walking, Oh yes son I'm talking to you. If you live at home with your momma, Oh yes son I'm talking to you.
analisis_canciones_pop.estribillo_clave: No, I don't want no scrub. A scrub is a guy that can't get no love from me. Hanging out the passenger side of his best friend's ride, trying to holler at me.
analisis_canciones_pop.proposito_gancho: Estándares: Declaración de que la mujer busca una pareja con madurez y ambición.

analisis_canciones_pop.estrofa_1_clave: A lonely mother gazing out of her window 'Staring at a son that she just can't touch.' If at any time he's in a jam, she'll be by his side.
analisis_canciones_pop.puente_clave: I seen a rainbow yesterday, but too many raindrops get in the way. Don't go chasing waterfalls.
analisis_canciones_pop.estribillo_clave: Don't go chasing waterfalls. Please stick to the rivers and the lakes that you're used to. I know that you're gonna have it your way or nothing at all, but I think you're moving too fast.

analisis_canciones_pop.estrofa_1_clave: Oh my god, we're back again. Brothers, sisters, everybody sing. We're gonna bring the flavor, show you how.

analisis_canciones_pop.estrofa_1_clave: You are my fire, the one desire. Believe when I say, I want it that way. But we are two worlds apart.
analisis_canciones_pop.puente_clave: Now I can see that we're falling apart. Tell me why I never wanna hear you say...
analisis_canciones_pop.estribillo_clave: Tell me why, ain't nothin' but a heartache. Tell me why, ain't nothin' but a mistake. Tell me why, I never wanna hear you say 'I want it that way'.
analisis_canciones_pop.proposito_gancho: Confusión: El lamento sobre una relación destinada a estar junta, pero con un obstáculo inexplicable.

analisis_canciones_pop.estrofa_1_clave: Oh, baby, baby, how was I supposed to know that something wasn't right here? Oh, baby, baby, I shouldn't have let you go.
analisis_canciones_pop.puente_clave: My loneliness is killing me (And I I must confess I still believe). When I'm not with you I lose my mind.

analisis_canciones_pop.estrofa_1_clave: I feel like I've been locked up tight for a million years. Waiting for someone to set me free. / You bring me out of the darkness and show me the light.
analisis_canciones_pop.puente_clave: Oh, my body's saying 'Let's go'. Oh, but my heart is saying 'No'.
analisis_canciones_pop.estribillo_clave: I'm a genie in a bottle, you gotta rub me the right way. I'm a genie in a bottle, baby, come on and let me out.
analisis_canciones_pop.proposito_gancho: Control/Deseo: La chica pone las condiciones para liberar su deseo sexual.

analisis_canciones_pop.estrofa_1_clave: Yo, I'll tell you what I want, what I really, really want. So tell me what you want, what you really, really want.
analisis_canciones_pop.puente_clave: If you wanna be my lover, you gotta get with my friends. Make it last forever, friendship never ends.
analisis_canciones_pop.estribillo_clave: If you wanna be my lover, you gotta get with my friends. If you want to get down with me, then you gotta make an effort.
analisis_canciones_pop.proposito_gancho: Prioridad: Un himno sobre la prioridad de la amistad (Girl Power) sobre la relación romántica.

analisis_canciones_pop.estrofa_1_clave: No matter how hard I try, you keep pushing me aside. And I can't break through, there's no talking to you.
analisis_canciones_pop.puente_clave: Well, I guess I just fell apart. I don't know where to go and I don't know what to do.

analisis_canciones_pop.proposito_gancho: Duda/Resurgir: Expresa el escepticismo sobre si es posible volver a amar después de una desilusión.

analisis_canciones_pop.estrofa_1_clave: And I'd give up forever to touch you, 'cause I know that you feel me somehow. You're the closest to heaven that I'll ever be.
analisis_canciones_pop.puente_clave: When everything's meant to be broken, I just want you to know who I am.

analisis_canciones_pop.proposito_gancho: Vulnerabilidad: El deseo de ser comprendido y aceptado por una sola persona en medio de la imperfección.

analisis_canciones_pop.estrofa_1_clave: I look and stare so deep in your eyes, I touch on you more and more every time. When you leave, I'm begging you not to go. Call your name two or three times in a row.

analisis_canciones_pop.proposito_gancho: Anticipación: La promesa y la sensación de que una noche de fiesta será memorable y divertida.

analisis_canciones_pop.estrofa_1_clave: There's a fire starting in my heart, reaching a fever pitch and it's bringing me out of the dark. Finally, I can see you crystal clear. Go ahead and sell me out.

analisis_canciones_pop.proposito_gancho: Venganza/Furia: Expresa la ira y la determinación de revelar la verdad tras una traición.

analisis_canciones_pop.puente_clave: And maybe we found love right where we are. Thinking out loud.
analisis_canciones_pop.estribillo_clave: And darling I will be loving you 'til we're seventy. And baby my heart could still fall as hard at twenty-three. And maybe we found love right where we are.
analisis_canciones_pop.proposito_gancho: Compromiso Eterno: El amor que promete perdurar hasta la vejez y a pesar del paso del tiempo.

analisis_canciones_pop.estrofa_1_clave: I said, ooh, I'm blinded by the lights. No, I can't sleep until I feel your touch. / I'm just calling back to let you know (I can't see clearly when you're gone).

analisis_canciones_pop.estribillo_clave: I said, ooh, I'm blinded by the lights. No, I can't sleep until I feel your touch.
analisis_canciones_pop.proposito_gancho: Adicción/Urgencia: La necesidad urgente de volver a una amante, con una sensación de euforia.

analisis_canciones_pop.estribillo_clave: Cause the players gonna play, play, play, play, play. And the haters gonna hate, hate, hate, hate, hate. Baby, I'm just gonna shake, shake, shake, shake, shake. I shake it off, I shake it off.
